text: Marguerite Louise Skliris-Alvarez ( Skliris; April 7, 1922 - June 23, 2023) known as Margia Dean, was an American beauty queen and actress. Her best known roles were in Shep Come Home (1948), Red Desert (1949), FBI Girl (1951), The Lonesome Trail (1955), Villa!! (1958) and Seven Women from Hell (1961). ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1922 births Category:Beauty pageant winners Category:American movie actors Category:American television actors Category:American stage actors Category:Actors from Chicago Category:Models from Chicago Category:2023 deaths
title: Margia Dean
